title: Handy Lyrics System Of A Down
creator: Kultida Anekboon

extendedInfo.description: If you are System Of A Down's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check System Of A Down's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all System Of A Down's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of System Of A Down's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - System of a Down- Toxicity- Steal This Album!- Mezmerize- Hypnotize-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 36- A.D.D.
